channel.title: Data-Archival on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 04 Mar 2021 00:00
item.description:
A fascinating talk by Jonah Edwards to the Internet Archive staff. They manage ~200PB of data in-house!

https://archive.org/download/jonah-edwards-presentation/jonah-edwards-presentation_720p.mp4

A fascinating talk by Jonah Edwards to the Internet Archive staff. They manage ~200PB of data in-house!
